Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ
Entry.EnglishText: Monica

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ・集会所前
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz - Front of Meeting House

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ・集会所前
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz - Front of Meeting House

Entry.JapaneseText: 集会所
Entry.EnglishText: Meeting House

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア…… すまなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... I'm sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何があったの？ 一体……何が……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What happened? What in the world...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……覚えていないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: You don't remember?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>の身体から出てきた 青い光に包まれて…… それから……私……
Entry.EnglishText: I remember being enveloped in a blue light that was radiating from you... After that, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……キミは、ずっと氷の中に 閉じ込められていたんだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: You've been trapped in ice this whole time.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなたたちは……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Who are you two?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こいつが、おまえを 助けるのを手伝ってくれた……
Entry.EnglishText: ...These guys helped me rescue you.

Entry.JapaneseText: はじめまして。ボクは<Mao>。 こっちは……
Entry.EnglishText: Pleased to meet you! My name's <Mao>, and this is...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>・ガラルドだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene> Gallardo.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>のフォルスが暴走し、 君はそれに巻き込まれた。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> lost control of his Force, and unfortunately, you got caught up in it.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、一年たった今…… <Veigue>はようやく 君を救い出した。
Entry.EnglishText: And now, after a whole year, he's finally managed to free you.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア…… 本当にすまなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... I'm so sorry.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……キミを氷の中に閉じ込めたのは <Veigue>の意思じゃないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Veigue> didn't mean to trap you in ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何度もキミを助けようとしたはずさ。 ……そうでしょ、<Veigue>？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure he tried to save you hundreds of times. Right, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……そんなに 手を傷だらけにして……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>! Your hands are all scuffed up...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私を助け出すために……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that because you were trying to get me out?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……だが、オレにはどうする事も できなかった……できたのは、 クレアを見守る事だけだった。
Entry.EnglishText: ...No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't free you. All I could do was watch over you.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……オレはこれから おまえにどうしてやれば……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...if there's anything that I can do for you...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あっ！ <Veigue>、私…… 家に帰らなきゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! <Veigue>, I... I ought to head back to the house!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんやお母さんも 心配しているだろうし、 安心させてあげたいの。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure Mother and Father have been worried sick about me. I want to let them know I'm okay.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、助けてくれて ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, thank you for saving me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は、このとおり 元気だから。
Entry.EnglishText: As you can see, I'm all better now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの……よかったら、 お二人も私の家で 休んでいってください。
Entry.EnglishText: Um, if you don't mind... Would the two of you like to rest at my house?

Entry.JapaneseText: たいしたおもてなしは できませんけど、お食事の 用意をして待っています。
Entry.EnglishText: It won't be much, but I can prepare a little supper for you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いい娘だな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...What a nice young lady.

Entry.JapaneseText: さて、と…… ごちそうになりに行こっかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Okaaay, so... Who's up for grabbing a bite?

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルス使ったから、 お腹ペコペコだよー。
Entry.EnglishText: All that Force business made me really hungry!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかってるってば。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I know, I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、キミに話があるんだよ。 ボクたちはそのために キミに会いに来たんだからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, we still need to talk to you about something. That's the reason why we came to see you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここで聞く。
Entry.EnglishText: Go ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: できれば、落ち着いた ところで話がしたい。
Entry.EnglishText: If possible, I'd prefer to talk somewhere with a little more privacy.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれは……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, that's...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 氷のバイラス、 フローズドクロウだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's an Ice Birus! A Frost Crow!

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちへ来るぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's coming right for us!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなどったか……
Entry.EnglishText: We underestimated it...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもココでやられる ワケにはいかない！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I have no plans of going down here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: へへッ……お腹がへって もう力が出ないや……
Entry.EnglishText: Heh... Guess I'm no good on an empty stomach.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして村の中にまで バイラスが……？
Entry.EnglishText: What in the world are Biruses doing inside the village...?

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスは自然界にあるものが 怪物に姿を変えたものだ。 どこにでも現れる可能性はある。
Entry.EnglishText: Biruses are flora and fauna that have mutated into monsters. It's possible for them to turn up anywhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: ある事がきっかけで、世界中で 能力者もバイラスも数が増えてるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks to a certain incident, the number of Biruses and Force users throughout the world has been on the rise.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……フォルスの発現…… ……バイラスの増加…… 一体、何が起きているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: The awakening of Force users... The increasing number of Biruses... What on earth is going on?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Mao>、おまえは 「世界を救うため」と言ったな。 それは……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, you said something about saving the world. What did you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ゴ、ゴメン……ボク、 限界みたいなんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: S-Sorry, looks like I've reached my limit...

Entry.JapaneseText: 話は長くなる。 その前に<Mao>にメシを 食わせてやってくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: This discussion is going to take a while. Why don't we get <Mao> something to eat first?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかった……こっちだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Sure thing. This way.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレアの事……感謝する。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you...for helping save Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><Mao>と<Eugene>が 仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><Mao> and <Eugene> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: この一年ずーっと <Veigue>はクレアを 守り続けたのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> has been guarding Claire for a whole year.

Entry.JapaneseText: もし私があんなになった時、 守ってくれる人がいると いいんだけどなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: If something like that ever happens to me, I hope I'll have someone there to protect me...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、さっきクレアが…… クレアが来たけど…… やっと……やっと元に戻ったのね！
Entry.EnglishText: I just saw Claire come this way, <Veigue>... So she's finally free!

Entry.JapaneseText: よかったね、<Veigue>！ 一年間、守り続けて来たんだもんね！ 本当によかったね!!
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness! After you spent a whole year of making sure she was safe... This is truly a miracle!
Entry.Notes: changed truly a wonderful thing to miracle. it's close enough.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアが無事に戻って来て、 私もすっごくうれしいわ！
Entry.EnglishText: Having Claire back safe and sound makes me really happy too!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、これからも クレアを守ってあげてね！
Entry.EnglishText: Never stop protecting Claire, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
